name: flightID
description: the date corresponding to the first flight date of the overall mission

name: drone
description: specific drone used for the mission

name: dataType
description: what kind of data was collected by the drone? E.g. RGB, lidar, multispectral (X-bands), hyperspectral

name: scale
description: geographic scale of mission, e.g. full (island), partial, plot

name: gpsSource
description: source of the GPS information, e.g. drone, RTK, PPK

name: sensor
description: name of sensor used. This should be the camera and/or specific lidar / hyperspectral sensor

name: overlapSide
description: the percent horizontal overlap of the drone survey

name: overlapFront
description: the percent forward overlap of the drone survey

name: nFlights
description: the number of flights needed to complete each mission

name: dateFlights_ymd
description: list of the dates (yyyy-mm-dd) on which flights were made for the mission

name: dateAligned
description: flightID that this flight was aligned to for the DSM

name: ortho
description: binary indication if an orthomosaic was made (1) or not (0)

name: notes
description: any pertinent notes about the flightID
